verses.verse: וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> took עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> Then the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹאָחָ֖ז <S%H3059><s%> Jehoahaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah וַיַּמְלִיכֻ֥הוּ <S%H4427><s%> and made him king תַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> place אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> in his father's בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> stead in Jerusalem

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁל֧וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years יוֹאָחָ֣ז <S%H3099><s%> Jehoahaz בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2320><s%> months מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיְסִירֵ֥הוּ <S%H5493><s%> put him down מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem וַֽיַּעֲנֹשׁ֙ <S%H6064><s%> and condemned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> in an hundred כִכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> talents כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְכִכַּ֥ר <S%H3603><s%> and a talent זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> of gold

וַיַּמְלֵ֨ךְ <S%H4427><s%> king מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְיָקִ֣ים <S%H471><s%> made Eliakim אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> his brother עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> over Judah וִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> and turned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יְהוֹיָקִ֑ים <S%H3079><s%> to Jehoiakim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָחָ֤ז <S%H3099><s%> Jehoahaz אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> his brother לָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took נְכ֔וֹ <S%H5224><s%> And Necho וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <S%H935><s%> and carried מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> him to Egypt פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <S%H3079><s%> Jehoiakim בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he did הָרַ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> his God

עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> against עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> Against him came up נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וַיַּֽאַסְרֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H631><s%> and bound בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <S%H5178><s%> him in fetters לְהֹלִיכ֖וֹ <S%H1980><s%> take בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> him to Babylon

וּמִכְּלֵי֙ <S%H3627><s%> of the vessels בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> also carried נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar לְבָבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> to Babylon וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> and put בְּהֵיכָל֖וֹ <S%H1964><s%> them in his temple בְּבָבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> at Babylon

וְיֶתֶר֩ <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts יְהֽוֹיָקִ֜ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim וְתֹֽעֲבֹתָ֤יו <S%H8441><s%> and his abominations אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> which he did וְהַנִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> and that which was found עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> against הִנָּ֣ם <S%H2005><s%> behold כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> in him behold they [are] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned יְהוֹיָכִ֥ין <S%H3078><s%> and Jehoiachin בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁמוֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> [was] eight שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יְהוֹיָכִ֣ין <S%H3078><s%> Jehoiachin בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> three חֳדָשִׁים֙ <S%H2320><s%> months וַעֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלִתְשׁוּבַ֣ת <S%H8666><s%> was expired הַשָּׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> And when the year שָׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king נְבֽוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֔ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar וַיְבִאֵ֣הוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought בָבֶ֔לָה <S%H894><s%> him to Babylon עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with כְּלֵ֖י <S%H3627><s%> vessels חֶמְדַּ֣ת <S%H2532><s%> with the goodly בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּמְלֵךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H6667><s%> and made Zedekiah אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> over Judah וִֽירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְאַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> [was] one שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> his God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not נִכְנַ֗ע <S%H3665><s%> [and] humbled מִלִּפְנֵ֛י <S%H6440><s%> not himself before יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet מִפִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> [speaking] from the mouth יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> also בַּמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> against king נְבֽוּכַדְנֶאצַּר֙ <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מָרָ֔ד <S%H4775><s%> And he also rebelled אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הִשְׁבִּיע֖וֹ <S%H7650><s%> who had made him swear בֵּֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> by God וַיֶּ֤קֶשׁ <S%H7185><s%> but he stiffened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרְפּוֹ֙ <S%H6203><s%> his neck וַיְאַמֵּ֣ץ <S%H553><s%> and hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָב֔וֹ <S%H3824><s%> his heart מִשּׁ֕וּב <S%H7725><s%> from turning אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

גַּ֠ם <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> Moreover all the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְהָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people הִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> much [לִמְעֹול־ כ] (לִמְעָל־ <S%H4603><s%> transgressed מַ֔עַל <S%H4603><s%> transgressed ק) כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all תֹּעֲב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> after all the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וַֽיְטַמְּאוּ֙ <S%H2930><s%> and polluted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הִקְדִּ֖ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> which he had hallowed בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיִּשְׁלַ֡ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֧ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> unto בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> to them by מַלְאָכָ֖יו <S%H4397><s%> his messengers הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> rising up betimes וְשָׁל֑וֹחַ <S%H7971><s%> and sending כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חָמַ֥ל <S%H2550><s%> because he had compassion עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> on his people וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on מְעוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H4583><s%> and on his dwelling place

וַיִּֽהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מַלְעִבִים֙ <S%H3931><s%> But they mocked בְּמַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> the messengers הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּבוֹזִ֣ים <S%H959><s%> and despised דְּבָרָ֔יו <S%H1697><s%> his words וּמִֽתַּעְתְּעִ֖ים <S%H8591><s%> and misused בִּנְבִאָ֑יו <S%H5030><s%> his prophets עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> until עֲל֧וֹת <S%H5927><s%> arose חֲמַת־ <S%H2534><s%> until the wrath יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> against his people עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until לְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <S%H4832><s%> till [there was] no remedy

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> Therefore he brought עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> upon them the king [כַּשְׂדִּיִּים כ] (כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <S%H3778><s%> Chaldeans ק) וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <S%H2026><s%> who slew בַּחוּרֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H970><s%> their young men בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house מִקְדָּשָׁ֔ם <S%H4720><s%> of their sanctuary וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no חָמַ֛ל <S%H2550><s%> and had no compassion עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בָּח֥וּר <S%H970><s%> upon young man וּבְתוּלָ֖ה <S%H1330><s%> or maiden זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2205><s%> old man וְיָשֵׁ֑שׁ <S%H3486><s%> or him that stooped for age הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> [them] all into his hand

וְ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> All כְּלֵ֞י <S%H3627><s%> And all the vessels בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God הַגְּדֹלִ֣ים <S%H1419><s%> great וְהַקְּטַנִּ֔ים <S%H6996><s%> and small וְאֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֹצְר֥וֹת <S%H214><s%> and the treasures הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וְשָׂרָ֑יו <S%H8269><s%> and of his princes הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> all [these] he brought בָבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> to Babylon
